entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IsHidden on HostSpecificTemplateData for CLI #40259
  • Parsing of arguments works different for MSbuild and dotnet build commands #40236
  • Overload resolution ambiguity introduced by SDK 8.0.300-preview.24203.14 #40235

Closed

  • [8.0.100-rc.2] Potential for incompatibility between Razor Tooling in Visual Studio and the .NET SDK #35810
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet list package not working, if msbuild properties are not defaulting #40255
  • [9.0-preview.2] Inconsistent messaging of success vs. warnings from dotnet test #39665
  • .NET 6.0.28 unable find pkg Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.ubuntu.22.04-x64 #40217

PullRequests

Created

  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40258
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #40256
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add APICompat support for checking generic constraints #40230
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Only pack as tool shim in VMR builds when signing is possible #40262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge dotnet/Installer `src` and `test` folder histories #40084
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add repository policy to label and close stale issues #40226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Re-enable a bunch of container tests #40191
    untriaged, Area-Containers
